title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 253.12 - Hearings; rights of parties
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 253.12 - Hearings; rights of parties

State Regulations

In any hearing all parties shall have the right to call, examine and cross-examine witnesses, and to introduce documentary or other
evidence, subject to the rulings of the hearing officer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
253.12

Renumbered from 253.37

New

York State Register February 15, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 07, eff. 2/15/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
